an9.92:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five emotional shackles.
an9.92:1.3: Firstly, a mendicant isn’t free of greed for sensual pleasures. …
an9.92:1.4: These are the five emotional shackles.
an9.92:2.1: To give up these five emotional shackles you should develop the four bases of psychic power.
an9.92:2.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm, and active effort.
an9.92:2.4: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy, and active effort.
an9.92:2.5: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development, and active effort.
an9.92:2.6: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry, and active effort.
an9.92:2.7: To give up these five emotional shackles you should develop these four bases of psychic power.”
